name: 2020.02/ProjetoII/The Bard's Legend
description:
The Bard's Legend is a musical runner game that puts you in control of three musicians, rushing to bring their song to the land.

Commands

To use the Flute press Z and kill blue enemies.

To use the Drums press X and kill red enemies.

To use the Lute press C and kill green enemies.

Match the instruments to the correct enemies and avoid obstacles by jumping and ducking with the Up and Down arrows keys.

Press the Up arrow key when jumping to glide for a period of time.

Items

Through the game you will gather Notes, with these notes you can buy items that will help you in your adventure.

The Magnet Thing, it will gather notes automatically for a period of time, press V to use this item.

The Double Jump, with this item you can jump again and escape from pits.
